subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Bernd Wiesberger shot a course-record seven-under 65 to take a one-stroke lead over Marcus Fraser after the second-round of the Ballantine’s Championship in Seoul.
snippet: Bernd Wiesberger shot a course-record seven-under 65 to take a one-stroke lead over Marcus Fraser after the second-round of the Ballantine’s Championship in Seoul.
